articles.title: Niger coup: A litmus test for democracy in West Africa - BBC
articles.description: Regional leaders have threatened military action against the junta if it refuses to give up power.
articles.content:
President Bola Tinubu, who is at the helm of regional superpower Nigeria, regards the coup across the border in Niger as a litmus test for democracy in West Africa. 
Having assumed the chairmanship … [+6065 chars]
